name: Whip Mastery

sections.body: You no longer provoke attacks of opportunity when attacking with a whip. You can deal lethal damage with a whip, although you can still deal nonlethal damage when you want. Further, you can deal damage with a whip despite a creature's armor bonus or natural armor bonus.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Attacking with a whip provokes attacks of opportunity as if you used a ranged weapon. A whip deals no damage to a creature that has an armor bonus of +1 or natural armor bonus of +3.
sections.name: Normal

description: Your superior expertise with this weapon does not provoke attacks of opportunity from your enemies.
